name: Pad See Ew
description: Stir-fried wide rice noodles with egg, Chinese broccoli, and soy sauce. Choice of chicken or tofu.

name: Beef Cubes Over Tomato Sauce Rice
description: Black pepper beef cubes served over steamed rice with a tangy tomato sauce.

name: Korean BBQ Short Ribs
description: Marinated beef short ribs grilled with sweet-savory soy sauce. Served with rice and kimchi.

name: Tropical Mango Freeze
description: Slushy mango smoothie blended with mango chunks and tapioca pearls.

name: Lychee Green Tea
description: Chilled green tea with lychee syrup, fruit bits, and crystal boba.
